Open dining space adjacent to the kitchen and living room; integrates seamlessly with the overall flow of the house.
Well-equipped kitchen area featuring modern appliances, Mediterranean tiles, and plenty of storage options. Open layout complements the living spaces.
Combined dining and kitchen space that encourages family interaction; designed for efficient workflow.

Quiet study area designed for work and relaxation with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows.
Fully equipped gym space designed for personal training sessions and fitness activities; soundproofed to maintain privacy.
